de.targodan.usb.io

Class SingleChannelFileDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.targodan.usb.io.ReaderDataSource
      • de.targodan.usb.io.SingleChannelFileDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSource

    public class SingleChannelFileDataSource
extends ReaderDataSource
    The SingleChannelFileDataSource is a ReaderDataSource that creates a reader from a file.
